casebody.data:
Samuel Weiss, et al., Respondents v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 14, 1892. Appeal by defendants from a judgment in favor of plaintiffs, entered upon the report of a referee. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, attorneys, and Charles Gibson Bennett of counsel, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, *500Ch. J., Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Gildersleeve, J.; Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Dugro, J. concurred.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
